name: Patagonia Sun Bucket Hat - Infants to Children
description:
Cute and floppy, but never frivolous. The Sun Bucket Hat has a wraparound brim to  protect tender skin on a child's head, neck, and ears.Made of 3-ply Supplex® nylon, with DWR (durable water repellency) finish.Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection.Chin strap has hook-and-loop fastener that can be tucked when not in use.Reverses print or solid design.

        Sustainability
